metadata.Title: CVE-2021-38491 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description:
Mixed-content checks were unable to analyze opaque origins which led tosome mixed content being loaded. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 92.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-38491` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 92.0+build3-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '92.0+build3-0ubuntu1').
mozjs78 package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
